title: TOWIE's Amber Turner highlights her figure in a black leather playsuit on girls' night out
text:
She recently insisted her relationship with her boyfriend Dan Edgar is 'completely fine', after admitting she 'always gets told to break up with him'.

But Amber Turner enjoyed a girls' only outing as she headed for dinner at London's Bloomsbury Street Kitchen on Saturday evening.

The TOWIE star, 26, ensured all eyes were on her as she slipped into a black leather playsuit, which highlighted her enviably lean legs.

Looking good: Amber Turner enjoyed a girls' only outing as she headed for dinner at London's Bloomsbury Street Kitchen on Saturday evening

Maintaining her ensemble's colour scheme, the TV personality boosted her physique in a pair of dark barely-there strappy heels.

The reality star injected even more glamour into her appearance as she accessorised with her favourite silver watch and toted her belongings in a £2,700 saddle canvas bag by Christian Dior.

With her golden locks styled into glossy waves, the blonde bombshell accentuated her beauty with heavy strokes of dewy make-up.

Wow-factor! The TOWIE star, 26, ensured all eyes were on her as she slipped into a black leather playsuit, which highlighted her enviably lean legs

Strutting her stuff: Maintaining her ensemble's colour scheme, the TV personality boosted her physique in a pair of dark barely-there strappy heels

All in the details: The reality star injected even more glamour into her appearance as she toted her belongings in a £2,700 saddle canvas bag by Christian Dior

Catching the eye: With her golden locks styled into glossy waves, the blonde bombshell accentuated her beauty with heavy strokes of dewy make-up

Amber recently touched on the pressures of having her romance cast in the spotlight, admitting 'everyone is waiting for Dan to mess up' in a candid interview with MailOnline.

The couple have endured a tumultuous romance, with Dan pursuing Clelia Theodorou and (earlier this year) Chloe Sims during breaks in their relationship.

The pair last had an argument in Marbella, with the blonde beauty sobbing to Chloe Meadows that she felt all of his friends 'hated her' when he went out partying and ignored her.

Now back home, she told MailOnline: 'We're completely fine. All couples have their rows.

'Obviously we have been through so much, people judge it and they’re like "break-up with him”. They’re waiting for Dan to mess up.

'When couples get back together in the normal world nobody knows about the arguments they have behind closed doors. But because it’s on TV everyone judges you way more.'
description: The TOWIE star, 26, enjoyed a girls' only outing as she headed for dinner at London's Bloomsbury Street Kitchen on Saturday evening.
